WidgetType.name: WidgetType

FROB.name: FROB
FROB.docstring: Any small device or object (usually hand-sized) which can be manipulated.

KNOB.name: KNOB
KNOB.docstring: The kind that you can use to open a door.

WidgetType.docstring: What kinds of widgets can we buy and sell?

WidgetRequisition.name: WidgetRequisition
WidgetRequisition.docstring:
We are looking to buy / sell some quantity of widgets,
subject to price and quantity constraints.

@should min(abs(minWidgets), abs(maxWidgets)) * minPrice <= budget,
        'Your requisition can never be satisfied'

budgetCents.name: budgetCents
budgetCents.docstring:
How much can we spend on this order of widgets?
@must _ > 0

minPriceCents.name: minPriceCents

maxPriceCents.name: maxPriceCents
maxPriceCents.docstring:
Our physical security can't deal with high-value items.
@must minPrice <= _

requisition.name: requisition
requisition.docstring: The requisition that generated this order.
